text: The Judgment on the Earth
Look! Yahweh \add is\add* about to lay the earth waste
and \add is\add* about to devastate it,
and he will twist her surface,
and he will scatter her inhabitants.
And it shall be as \add with\add* the people, so \add with\add* the priest;
as \add with\add* the slave, so \add with\add* his master;
as \add with\add* the female slave, so \add with\add* her mistress;
as \add with\add* the buyer, so \add with\add* the seller;
as \add with\add* the lender, so \add with\add* the borrower;
as \add with\add* the creditor, so \add with\add* \add the one\add* to whom he lends.
The earth shall be utterly laid waste,
and it shall be utterly plundered,
for Yahweh has spoken this word.
The earth dries up, it withers;
\add the\add* world languishes, it withers.
The elevated of the people of the earth languish,
and the earth is defiled beneath its inhabitants.
For they have transgressed laws;
they have passed by statutes;\f + \fr 24:5 \ft Hebrew “statute” \f*
they have broken \add the\add* everlasting covenant.
Therefore a curse devours \add the\add* earth,
and the inhabitants in it suffer for their guilt.
Therefore \add the\add* inhabitants of \add the\add* earth burn,
and ⸤few men are left⸥.\f + \fr 24:6 \ft Literally “he is left a man of smallness” \f*
\add The\add* new wine dries up;
\add the\add* vine languishes.
All \add the\add* merry of heart sigh;
\add the\add* joy of \add the\add* tambourine has stopped.
The noise of \add the\add* jubilant has ceased;
\add the\add* joy of \add the\add* lyre has stopped.
They do not drink wine with song;
strong drink is bitter to those who drink it.
\add The\add* city of emptiness is broken;
every house is shut ⸤so that no one can enter⸥;\f + \fr 24:10 \ft Literally “from entering” \f*
\add there is\add* an outcry over the wine in the streets.
All joy turns into ⸤darkness⸥;\f + \fr 24:11 \ft Literally “evening” \f*
the joy of the earth disappears.
Desolation is left in the city;
\add the\add* gate is crushed \add into\add* a state of ruin.
For it shall be like this in the midst of the earth,
among the nations,
like \add the\add* beating of an olive tree,
like gleanings when a grape harvest is at an end.
They lift up their voices;\f + \fr 24:14 \ft Hebrew “voice” \f* they sing for joy;
they shout out from \add the\add* west over the majesty of Yahweh.
Therefore glorify Yahweh in the east,
the name of Yahweh the God of Israel in the coastlands of the sea.
We hear songs from the ⸤edge⸥\f + \fr 24:16 \ft Literally “wing” \f* of the earth:
“Glory to the righteous \add one\add*!”
But I say, “Ruin to me!
Ruin to me! Woe to me!
\add The\add* treacherous ones deal treacherously,
and \add the\add* treacherous ones deal treacherously \add with\add* treachery!”
Terror and \add the\add* pit and \add the\add* snare \add are\add* upon you, inhabitants\f + \fr 24:17 \ft Hebrew “inhabitant” \f* of the earth!
And this shall happen:
The one who flees from the sound of the terror shall fall into the pit,
and the one who goes up from ⸤inside the pit⸥\f + \fr 24:18 \ft Literally “the middle of the pit” \f* shall be caught in the snare,
for \add the\add* windows from heaven are opened,
and \add the\add* foundations of \add the\add* earth tremble.
The earth is utterly broken;
\add the\add* earth is torn asunder;
\add the\add* earth is shaken violently.
\add The\add* earth staggers to and fro like the drunkard,
and it sways like \add a\add* hut,
and its transgression is heavy upon it,
and it falls and does not rise again.
And this shall happen on that day:
Yahweh will punish the host of heaven in heaven,
and the kings of the earth on the earth.
And they will be gathered \add in\add* a gathering, \add like\add* a prisoner ⸤in⸥\f + \fr 24:22 \ft Literally “on” \f* a pit.
And they will be shut ⸤in⸥\f + \fr 24:22 \ft Literally “on” \f* a prison and be punished ⸤after⸥\f + \fr 24:22 \ft Literally “from” \f* many days.
And the full moon will be ashamed
and the sun will be ashamed,
for Yahweh of hosts will rule on ⸤Mount Zion⸥\f + \fr 24:23 \ft Literally “the mountain of Zion” \f* and in Jerusalem,
and before his elders \add in\add* glory.
